cards.front: What are the basic components of a machine learning model?
cards.back: The basic components include data (input and output), an algorithm to process the input data, a model that is trained using this algorithm, and evaluation metrics to assess the model's performance.

insights.title: The Importance of Iterative Learning in Machine Learning
insights.takeaway: Machine learning models improve through iterative processes, akin to spaced repetition and retrieval practice techniques in memory enhancement, where repeated exposure and active recall strengthen understanding and performance.
